Translations.Text: Naybilʹsh exalted yavlyaye soboyu u chyyikh rukakh ye vse tsaryuvannya, ta Vin Omnipotent
khto utvoryv smertʹ ta zhyttya dlya mety rozriznyuyuchoyi tsiyeyi sered vas shcho by zrobyly krashche. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Mohutniy, Probachayuchyy
Vin utvoryv sim vsesvit u verstvakh. Vy ne bachyte budʹ-yakyy imperfection u stvorenni naybilʹshym Dobrozychlyvomu. Utrymayte dyvlyatʹsya; vy bachyte budʹ-yaku vadu
Dyvlyatʹsya znov ta znov; vashi ochi povernutʹsya stumped ta zavoyovanyy
My prykrasyly naybilʹsh nyzʹkyy vsesvit z lampamy, ta pylʹnuvaly yoho kordony z projectiles proty chortiv; my hotovi do nykh retribution u Pekli
Dlya tsykh khto disbelieved u yikhnʹomu Lordi, retribution Gehenna. Shcho neshchasna dolya
Koly vony pryyizhdzhayutʹ kyneni tam, vony chuyutʹ yoho furor yak tse fumes
Tse mayzhe pidryvaye z rage. Koly zavhodno hrupa kydayutʹsya tam, yoho varty by poprosyly yikh, vy ne otrymuyete warner
Vony by vidpoviyily, "Tak diysno; warner prybuvaly do nas, ale my disbelieved ta skazaly, `god ne vidkryly budʹ shcho. Vy povnistyu astray
Vony takozh kazhutʹ, "Yakshcho b my pochuly abo zrozumili, my by ne buly sered dwellers Pekla
Otzhe, vony ziznalysya yikhni hrikhy. Prykroshchi do dwellers Pekla
Yak dlya tsiyeyi kotroyi povahy yikhniy Lord, koly vyklyuchno u yikhniy tayemnosti, vony dosyahnuly forgiveness ta velykoyi vynahorody
Chy vy derzhyte vashu tayemnytsyu vysloviv, abo zayavlyayete yikh, Vin znaye tsilkom nayhlybshi dumky
Vin ne Musytʹ znaty shcho Vin stvoryuvav? Vin yavlyaye soboyu Sublime, Naybilʹsh Cognizant
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto stavyv Zemlyu u vashiy sluzhbi. Blukayte yoho kuty, ta hostyatʹsya z Yoho umov. Yomu yavlyaye soboyu zaklyuchnyy sklykayuchyy
vy harantuvaly shcho u nebesakh ne vrazyty zemlyu ta prychyna tse do padinnya
vy harantuvaly shcho u nebesakh ne poshlete na vas nasylʹnytsʹkyy shtorm? Vy todi budete otsinyuvaty velychynu Moho poperedzhennya
Inshi pered tym, yak yim disbelieved; yak strashnyy Miy requital
vony ne pobachyly ptakhiv nad nymy vyshykuvalysʹ u kolonakh ta rozpovsyudzhuyutʹ yikhni kryla? Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto trymaye yikh u povitri. Vin Seer vsikh rechey
De tsi soldaty shcho mozhutʹ dopomoha vy proty naybilʹshoho Dobrozychlyvi? Diysno, disbelievers obmanyuyutʹsya
Khto tam zabezpechuyete dlya vas, yakshcho Vin utrymuye Yoho umovy? Diysno, vony porynuly hlyboki u porushennya ta antypatiyu
odyn khto prohulyanky v toy chas, yak slumped nad na yoho oblychchi krashche kerovaniy, abo odyn khto prohulyanky pryamo na pravi shlyakh
Kazhete, "Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto zapochatkuvav vas, ta harantuvaly vam slukhannya, ochi, ta mizky. Ridko vy appreciative
Kazhete, "Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto rozmistyv vas na zemli, ta pered tym, yak Yo vy budete sklykatysya
Vony vyklyk: "Koly shcho prorotstvo bude prybuvaty do propusku, yakshcho vy budete ye pravdyvi
Kazhutʹ, "Take znannya ye z BOHOM; YA ne ye bilʹsh nizh ochevydnyy warner
Koly vony bachatʹ , shcho tse vidbuvayetʹsya, oblychchya tsykh khto disbelieved povernetʹsya neshchasnyy, ta tse bude proholoshuvatysya: "Tse ye yaki vy zvychayno vysmiyuvaly
Kazhutʹ, BOH vyrishuye 'Chy vynyshchyty meni ta tsey withme, abo do nas zlyvy z Yoho myloserdyam, khto tam zakhyshchayutʹ disbelievers z bolisnoho retribution
Kazhutʹ, "Vin yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy; my virymo v Yomu, ta my doviryayemo u Yo. Vy bezsumnivno znaydete khto diysno daleko astray
Kazhete, "Shcho yakshcho vasha voda zanuryayetʹsya daleko, khto zabezpechytʹ vas z chystoyu vodoyu
Chernytsya, ruchka, ta yaki vony (lyudy) pyshutʹ
Vy dosyahnuly velykoho blahoslovennya z vashoho Lorda; vy ye ne bozhevilʹni
Vy dosyahnuly vynahorody shcho dobre zasluhovuyetʹsya
Vy blahoslovlyayetesʹ z velykoyu morallyu kharakter
Vy pobachyte, ta vony pobachatʹ
Kotryy vy zasudzhuyetesʹ
Vash Lord znaye tsilkom tsi khto zbylysya z shlyakhu Yoho shlyakh, ta Vin znaye tsilkom tsi khto keruyutʹsya
Ne pidkoryayutʹsya rejectors
Vony bazhayutʹ shcho vy komprometuyete, takym chynom vony nadto mozhutʹ pity na kompromys
Ne pidkoryayutʹsya kozhnomu nyzʹko swearer
slanderer, backbiter
Forbidder dobrodiynosti, porushnyka, hrishnyka
Unappreciative, ta zhadnyy
Nezvazhayuchy na te, shcho vin ovolodiv dosytʹ hroshovymy ta ditʹmy
Koly nashi vidkryttya deklamuyutʹsya yomu, vin kazhe, "Povisti z mynuli
My vidznachymo yoho oblychchya
My vyprobuvaly yikh lyubymo my vyprobuvaly vlasnykiv sadu khto prysyahnuvsya shcho vony zberutʹ urozhay tse u ranku
Vony perekonalysya tak absolyutno
vynesennya (shtorm) z vashoho Lorda proyshly povz tse v toy chas, yak vony spaly
Za dopomohoyu ranku, bulo bezplidno
Vony zaklykaly odyn odnoho u ranku
Dozvolyayutʹ nam zbyrayutʹ urozhay zerno
Na yikhnʹomu shlyakhu, vony doviryaly do odyn odnoho
Shcho z todi na, zhoden z nykh by ne buv bidni
Vony perekonalysya tak absolyutno yikhnʹoho urozhayu
Ale koly vony pobachyly tse, vony skazaly, "My buly tak nepravylʹni
Zaraz, my nichoho
spravedlyvyy sered nykh skazaly, "Yakby tilʹky vy glorified (Boh)
Vony skazaly, "Slava musytʹ nash Lord. My porushyly
Vony startuvaly osudyty odyn odnoho
Vony skazaly, "Prykroshchi do nas. My hrishyly
travenʹ nash Lord harantuyutʹ nam krashchyy. My kayemosya do nashoho Lorda
Takyy yavlyav soboyu requital. Ale retribution U maybutnʹomu daleko hirshyy, yakshcho vony tilʹky znaly
spravedlyvyy zasluzhyly, u yikhnʹomu Lordi, parku blazhenstva
my Budemo obrobyty Submitters lyubymo zlochyntsiv
Shcho nepravylʹnyy z vashoyu lohikoyu
vy mayete inshu knyhu uphold
U tse, vy znakhodyte budʹ shcho vy zakhochete
Abo, vy otrymaly urochysti zatverdzhennya z nas shcho harantuyete vam shchob ni vam bazhannya na Dni Resurrection
Prosyte yikh, "Khto harantuye tse dlya vas
vony mayutʹ idoliv? Dozvolʹte yikhnim idolam dopomahayutʹ yim, yakshcho vony ye pravdyvi
denʹ prybude koly vony budutʹ exposed, ta vony budutʹ vymahatysya shchob upasty prostrate, ale vony budutʹ nezdatni
Z yikhnimy ochamy pidkorene, prynyzhennya nakryye yikh. Vony buly zaprosheni shchob vpasty prostrate koly vony vmily vsi ta
Tomu, dozvolenyy Meni mayutʹ spravu z tsi khto vidkhylyayutʹ tse Hadith; my pryvedemo yikh na zvidky vony nikoly ne spryymutʹ
ya dam yim dosytʹ kanat; Miy zamyshlyayuchyy formidable
vy prosyte yikh dlya hroshey, takym chynom vony burdened shtrafom
vony znayutʹ maybutnye? Vony tse zapysalo
Vy budete steadfastly persevere u vykonuyuchykh komandakh vashoho Lorda. Ne vyhlyadayte yak (Jonah) khto zaklykav z vnutrishnosti ryba
Yakshcho b tse bulo ne dlya yoho charivnosti Lorda, vin by ejected u pustelyu yak hrishnyk
Ale yoho Lord blahoslovlyav yoho, ta zroblenoho yomu spravedlyvomu
Tsey khto disbelieved pokaz yikhniy ridicule u yikhnikh ochakh koly vony chuyutʹ povidomlennya ta kazhutʹ, "Vin ye bozhevilʹnyy
Tse - faktychno povidomlennya do svitu
bezperechnyy (podiya)
Shcho bezperechnyy (podiya)
spravdi bezperechno
Thamoud ta `aad disbelieved u Shocker
Yak dlya Thamoud, vony buly vynyshcheni spustoshlyvyy (tremtinnya)
Yak dlya `aad, vony buly vynyshcheni napolehlyvym, nasylʹnytsʹkym shtormom
Vin rozv'yazav tse na nykh dlya semy nochi ta vosʹmy dniv, nasylʹnytsʹko. Vy mohly pobachyty lyudey shpurnuly navkolo lyubyte decayed korpusy palʹmy
vy Mozhete znayty budʹ-yakyy slid z nykh
Pharaoh, inshi pered tym, yak yo, ta hrishnyky (Sodom) buv bezputni
Vony ne pidkoryalysya kur'yeru yikhnʹoho Lorda. Otzhe, Vin requited yim spustoshlyvyy requital
potik spustoshuvav, takym chynom my perevezly vas na plavayuchi (ark)
My nadaly tse urok dlya vas, shcho budʹ-yake slukhayuche vukho mozhe zrozumity
Koly rih duyetʹsya odnoho razu
zemlya ta hory budutʹ nosytysya ta budutʹ davytysya; nadzvychayno rozdavlenyy
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ koly nemynucha podiya prybude proyty
nebesa trisnutʹ, ta padinnya okremo
anhely budutʹ vsi navkolo, ta Vash dominion Lorda todi okhopytʹ visim (vsesvit)
Na shcho denʹ, vy budete exposed, nichoho vy ne mozhete buty prykhovani
Yak dlya khto otrymuye yoho zapys z yoho pravom ruka, vin skazhe, "Prybuvayutʹ prochytanyy miy zapys
ya vvazhav, shcho ya zbyravsya buty vlashtovanyy pidzvitnyy
Vin zasluzhyv shchaslyve zhyttya
U exalted Ray
Yoho frukty blyzʹki
Hostyatʹsya ta napiy happily v obmin na vashi pratsi u dnyakh mynulykh
Tomu shcho dlya nʹoho komu dayetʹsya yoho zapys u yoho lysheniy rutsi, vin skazhe, "O, ya by khotiv, shchob ya nikoly ne otrymav miy zapys
ya by khotiv, shchob ya nikoly ne znav miy rakhunok
ya by khotiv, shchob moya smertʹ bula vichna
Moyi hroshi ne mozhutʹ dopomohty meni
Vsya moya potuzhnistʹ znyknutʹ
Berutʹ yoho ta shackle yoho
Horyatʹ yo u Pekli
U lantsyuzi tse - simdesyat ozbroyennya dovho, pryv'yazuyutʹ yoho
Dlya vin ne viryv v BOHU, Naybilʹsh Velykomu
Ne zrobyv vin zakhyshchayutʹ hoduyuchyy bidnyy
Otzhe, vin ne maye tovarysha tut
Ne budʹ-yake prodovolʹstvo, krim hirkoho riznovydu
Prodovolʹstvo dlya hrishnykiv
ya prysyahayu shcho vy dyvytesʹ
Ta yaki vy ne dyvytesʹ
Tse yavlyaye soboyu vysliv pochesnoho kur'yera
Ne vysliv poeta; ridko robyty vy vvazhayete
Ne vysliv soothsayer; ridko robyty vy berete uvahu
vidkryttya z Lorda vsesvitu
Mav vin vymovyv budʹ-yaki inshi vykladannya
My by pokaraly yoho
My by zupynyly apokalipsys yomu
Zhoden z vy ne mohly dopomohly yomu
Tse ye reminder dlya spravedlyvyy
My znayemo; deyakyy z vy rejectors
Tse ale hore dlya disbelievers
Tse yavlyaye soboyu absolyutnu pravdu
Tomu, vy budete glorify nazva vashoho Lorda, Naybilʹsh Velykoho
questioner mozhe dopytaty nemynuchyy retribution
Dlya disbelievers, nikhto ne mozhe zupynyty tse
Z BOHA; Possessor nayvyshchoyi Vysoty
anhely, z yikhnimy zvitamy, pidnimayutʹsya yomu cherez denʹ shcho dorivnyuye p'yatdesyat tysyacholittya
Tomu, vy budete vdatysya do dobrozychlyvoho terpinnya
Dlya vony bachatʹ tse daleko
V toy chas, yak my bachymo tse duzhe zakryvayemo
denʹ prybude koly nebo bude lyublyatʹ molten skeli
hory budutʹ lyublyatʹ fluffy vovna
Niyakyy tovarysh ne popikluyetʹsya pro yoho blyzʹkoho pryyatelya
Koly vony bachatʹ yikh, vynuvati pobazhayutʹ vin mih daty yoho vlasnym dityam tomu shcho vykup, shchob zekonomyty yoho retribution toho dnya
Takozh yoho zhinka, ta yoho brat
Rivne yoho vse plem'ya shcho pidnimalo yoho
Navitʹ vsi lyudy na zemli, yakshcho tse by vryatuvalo yoho
Nomer; tse aflame
Neterplyachyy spalyty
Tse zaklykaye tsi khto prohnaly
Tsey khto prykhovaly ta rozrakhovanoho
Diysno, lyudsʹke isnuvannya ye tryvozhne
Yakshcho zatorknutyy neshchastyam, despondent
Yakshcho blahoslovlenyy bahat·stvom, stingy
Krim dlya worshipers
Khto zavzhdy zauvazhuyutʹ yikhni kontaktni molytvy (Salat)
Chastyna yikhnikh hroshey vidkladayetʹsya
Dlya bidnyy ta needy
Vony viryatʹ v Dnyu Vyroku
Vony povaha yikhniy Lord requital
Yikhniy requital Lorda ne vvazhayetʹsya odnoznachnym
Vony derzhatʹ yikhniy chastity
(Vony mayutʹ vidnoshennya) tilʹky z yikhnim podruzhzhyam, abo shcho ye pravovo yikhni
budʹ khto khto porushuye tsi mezhi ye hrishnyk
Ta viruyuchi derzhatʹ yikhnye slovo; vony ye dostovirni
Yikhnye svidchennya ye pravdyve
Vony stiyko zauvazhuyutʹ yikhni kontaktni molytvy (Salat) svoyechasno
Vony zasluzhyly pozytsiyu chesti u Rayu
Shcho keeping tsey khto disbelieved z pryyednuyuchykh vas
Pravoruch, ta livoruch, vony tikayutʹ
Yak budʹ-yaki yim mozhutʹ ochikuvaty vnesty blissful Ray
Nikoly ne; my utvoryly yikh, ta vony znayutʹ z yakoho
ya urochysto prysyahayu Lordom skhodu ta zakhodu; my vmiyemo
shchob zaminyty krashchykh lyudey u vashomu mistsi; my mozhemo nikoly ne buty zavdani porazky
Tomu, dozvolyayutʹ yim pomylku ta hru, do vony zustrichayutʹ denʹ shcho ochikuye yikh
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ vony vytikayutʹ z graves pospishayuchy, tak, yakby herded do (sacrificial) vivtari
Z yikhnimy ochamy pidkorenyy, sorom nakryye yikh. Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ shcho ochikuye yikh
My poslaly Noah do yoho lyudey: "Vy budete poperedyty vashykh lyudey pered bolisnym retribution afflicts yim
Vin skazav, "O moyi lyudy, ya ye ochevydnyy warner do vas
Do pylʹnykh vas shcho vy budete obozhnyuvaty BOHA, Yo povahy, ta bude pidkorytysya meni

Vin todi prostytʹ vas vashi hrikhy ta respite vy dlya predetermined period. Naybilʹsh bezperechno, BOZHE pryznachennya mozhe nikoly ne buty zatrymane, odnoho razu yomu musytʹ, yakshcho vy tilʹky znaly
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, ya zaprosyv moyikh lyudey nich ta denʹ
Ale moye zaproshennya tilʹky zbilʹshylo yikhnyu antypatiyu
Koly "zavhodno ya zaprosyv yikh buty proshchenyy Vamy, vony rozmistyly yikhni palʹtsi u yikhnikh vushrakh, nakrytykh sebe z yikhnim odyahom, napolyahaly, ta povernulysya zukhvali
Todi ya zaprosyv yikh suspilʹno
Todi ya proholosyv yim holosno, ta ya rozmovlyav z nymy pryvatno
ya skazav, `implore vash Lord dlya forgiveness; Vin Probachaye
he bude todi zlyva vy velykodushno z doshchem
and zabezpechuyete vas z hroshamy ta ditʹmy, ta fruktovymy sadamy, ta potokamy
Chomu vy ne musyte doklasty zusylʹ do BOHA povahy
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto utvoryv vas u étapiv
vy ne zdiysnyuyete shcho BOH utvoryv sim vsesvit u verstvakh
Vin zamyslyv misyatsʹ tam buty svitlo, ta rozmistylo sontse buty lampa
Ta BOH germinated vy z zemli lyubyte zavody
Todi Vin prybutky vy u tse, ta Vin bezsumnivno prynese vam
BOH zrobyv habitable zemli dlya vas
Shcho vy mozhete pobuduvaty dorohy tam
Noah skazav, "Miy Lord, vony ne pidkoryalysya meni, ta proslidkuvaly za tsymy khto navitʹ bilʹshe korumpuvalysʹ koly blahoslovlenyy z hroshamy ta ditʹmy
Vony zamyslyly strashni skhemy
Vony skazaly, `do ne pokydayutʹ vashykh bohiv. Ne pokynʹte Wadd, Suwaa`, Yaghouth, Ya`ooq, ta Nasr
Vony pryzvely do pomylky bahato. Tomu, dozvolenyy bezputnyy porynayutʹ bilʹsh hlybokyy u vtratu
Vnaslidok yikhnikh hrikhiv vony buly potonuti ta buly pryznacheni do hellfire. Vony ne znayshly helpers shchob zakhystyty yikh z BOHA
Noah takozh skazav, "Miy Lord, ne vid'yidzhayutʹ yedynyy disbeliever na zemli
Dlya yakshcho vy dozvolyayete yim, vony tilʹky pryzvedutʹ do pomylky vashi sluzhbovtsi ta rozhayutʹ nichoho ale bezputnyy disbelievers
Miy Lord, probachayutʹ meni ta moyi batʹky, ta budʹ khto khto vstupaye miy domashniy yak viruyuchyy, ta vesʹ viryachyy lyudyam ta zhinkam. Ale ne dayutʹ disbelievers budʹ shcho ale znyshchennya
Kazhu, "ya buv nadykhnutyy shcho hrupa jinns poslukhala, todi skazala, `we pochuly dyvovyzhnyy Quran
it dovidnyky do righteousness, ta my viryly v tse; my nikoly ne vstanovymo budʹ-yakykh idoliv bilya nashoho Lorda
the Naybilʹsh Vysoko ye nash tilʹky Lord. Vin nikoly ne mav tovarysha, ne syna
it yavlyaye soboyu durni sered nas khto zvychayno vymovlyav take bez·hluzdya pro BOHA
we podumav shcho ni humans, ni jinns, mih mozhlyvo vymovyty brekhnyu pro BOHA
human istoty zvychayno shukaly potuzhnosti cherez jinn istot, ale vony tilʹky afflicted yim z duzhe bahato neshchastya
they podumani, tochno, yak vy podumaly,,, kotryy BOH poshle inshyy (kur'yer)
we torknuvsya nebes ta znaydenoho tse zapovnenyy z vartamy formidable ta projectiles
we zvychayno sydiv tam dlya toho, shchob rozvidnyk. Budʹ khto khto slukhaye peresliduyetʹsya potuzhnyy projectile
we ne mayutʹ ideyi yakshcho shchosʹ pohane spryamovane na meshkantsiv Zemli, abo yakshcho yikhniy Lord wills shchob vykupyty yikh
some nas ye spravedlyvi, ta deyakyy menshe, nizh spravedlyvi; my sliduyemo za riznomanitnymy shlyakhamy
we znaly povni dobre shcho my mozhemo nikoly ne utikty z BOHA na Zemli; my mozhemo nikoly ne utikty ta vtecha
when my pochuly kerivnytstvo, my vvazhaly tam. Budʹ khto khto virytʹ v yoho Lordu bude nikoly ne bo budʹ-yakoyi nespravedlyvosti, ne budʹ-yakoho affliction
among ny yavlyayutʹ soboyu submitters, ta sered nas yavlyayutʹ soboyu compromisers.' " Yak dlya tsykh khto pidkorylysya, vony ye na pravi shlyakh
Yak dlya compromisers, vony budutʹ palyvo dlya Gehenna
Yakshcho vony zalyshayutʹsya na pravi shlyakh, my blahoslovymo yikh z abundant vodoyu
My bezsumnivno vyprobuyemo yikh vsikh. Yak dlya nʹoho khto disregards povidomlennya yoho Lorda, Vin napravytʹ yoho kolysʹ zbilʹshuyuchyy retribution
mistsya obozhnyuyutʹ nalezhatʹ BOHU; ne zaklykayte budʹ khto shche bilya BOHA
Koly BOZHYY sluzhbovetsʹ zakhyshchav Yoho vyklyuchno, mayzhe usi banded razom protystavyty yoho
Kazhu, "ya obozhnyuyu tilʹky moho Lorda; YA nikoly ne vstanovlyuyu budʹ-yakykh idoliv bilya Yoho
Kazhu, "ya ne volodiyu potuzhnistyu zavdaty shkody vam, ne shchob keruvaty vamy
Kazhu, "Niyakyy kozhnyy ne mozhe zakhystyty meni z BOHA, ne mozhe ya znakhodzhu budʹ-yakyy inshyy prytulok bilya Yoho
ya dostavlyayu BOZHI vidozvy ta povidomlennya." Tsey khto ne pidkoryayutʹsya BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeru zaznayutʹ vohnyu Pekla, prychomu vony perebuyutʹ zavzhdy
Odnoho razu vony dyvlyatʹsya shcho ochikuye yikh, vony znaydutʹ khto ye diysno bilʹsh slabyy u potuzhnosti, ta menshe u chysli
Kazhu, "ya ne znayu yakshcho shcho obitsyayetʹsya do vy vidbudetesʹ skoro, abo yakshcho miy Lord zatrymaye tse dlya deyakoho chasu
Vin yavlyaye soboyu Knower maybutnʹoho; Vin ne vidkryvaye maybutnye do budʹ khto
Tilʹky do kur'yera shcho Vin vybyraye, Vin vidkryvayutʹ z mynuloho ta maybutnʹoho, spetsyfichnoyi novyny
Tse musytʹ perekonatysya shcho vony dostavyly yikhni povidomlennya Lorda. Vin znaye tsilkom yaki vony. Vin rozrakhuvav nomery vsikh rechey
O vy cloaked
Rozdumuyutʹ protyahom nochi, krim ridko
Polovyna tse, abo nevelykoho menshoho
Abo trokhy bilʹshe. Ta prochytanyy Quran vid korky do korky
My damo vam vazhke povidomlennya
mirkuvannya unochi ye bilʹshe efektyvne, ta bilʹshe spravedlyvyy
Vy mayete duzhe bahato chasu pid chas dnya dlya inshykh materialiv
Vy budete svyatkuvaty nazvu vashoho Lorda, shchob prybuty kolysʹ blyzhchi ta blyzhchyy yomu
Lord skhodu ta zakhodu; nemaye inshoho boha bilya Yoho. Vy musyte vybraty Yoho yak vash prybichnyk
Ta zalyshayutʹsya steadfast pered yikhnimy vyslovamy, ta disregard yim u krasyvomu sposobi
Ta dozvolenyy Meni mayutʹ spravu z rejectors, khto velykodushno buv blahoslovlenyy; tilʹky davaty yim nevelykyy chas
My mayemo suvori pokarannya, ta Peklo
Prodovolʹstvo shcho mozhe ledve buty kovtnute, ta bolisnyy retribution
denʹ prybude koly zemlya ta hory budutʹ tremtity, ta hory povernutʹsya u weightless kupa
My poslaly do vas kur'yer, tilʹky tomu shcho my poslaly Pharaoh kur'yer
Pharaoh ne pidkoryalysya kur'yeru ta, otzhe, my pokaraly yoho suvoro
Yakshcho vy disbelieve, yak vy mozhete unyknuty dnya tak strashne shcho tse robytʹ nemovlya sirym-haired
nebesa budutʹ shatter zvidty. Yoho obitsyanka ye virna
Tse ye reminder; whoever wills, dozvolyayutʹ yomu vybyrayutʹ shlyakh do yoho Lorda

Vash Lord znaye shcho vy rozdumuyete protyahom dvokh-thirds nochi, abo polovyna tse, abo odnoho-tretʹoho tse, ta tak deyake z tsykh khto vvazhaly z vamy. BOH zamyslyv nich ta denʹ, ta Vin znaye shcho vy ne mozhete zavzhdy zrobyty tse. Vin probachyv vas. Zamistʹ tsʹoho, vy budete prochytaty shcho vy mozhete Quran. Vin znaye shcho deyakyy z vy mozhete buty khvori, inshi mozhutʹ mandruvaty u zanyatti BOZHYKH umov, ta inshi mozhutʹ dokladaty zusylʹ v im'ya BOHA. Vy budete prochytaty shcho vy mozhete tse, ta zauvazhuyete kontaktni molytvy (Salat), dayete obov'yazkovu dobrodiynistʹ (Zakat), ta zychyte BOHU pozyku righteousness. Shchob ni harni vy posylayete vpered vid imeni vashykh dush, vy znaydete tse u BOHU daleko krashche ta velykodushno nahorodyly. Ta blahayutʹ BOHA dlya forgiveness. BOH Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
O vy prykhovana tayemnytsya
Vykhodyatʹ ta poperedzhayutʹ
Extol vash Lord
Ochyshchayutʹ vash odyah
Forsake shcho ye nepravylʹnyy
vmist z vashoyu doleyu
Steadfastly svyatkuyutʹ vashoho Lorda
Todi, koly rih duyetʹsya
Shcho bude tyazhkyy denʹ
Dlya disbelievers, ne lehkyy
Dozvolenyy Meni mayu spravu z odyn ya stvoryuvav yak osoba
ya yakshcho yo z bahato hroshey
Ta dity dyvytysya
ya zrobyv vse lehke dlya nʹoho
Dosi, vin ye zhadnyy dlya bilʹshe
Vin uperto vidmovyvsya vyznaty tsi dokazy
ya vse bilʹshe pokarayu yoho
Dlya vin viddzerkalyv, todi vyrishyv
Neshchasnyy shcho vin vyrishyv
Neshchasnyy diysno shcho vin vyrishyv
Vin podyvyvsya
Vin nasupyv ta whined
Todi vin prohnav zukhvalo
Vin skazav, "Tse ale rozumne zacharuvannya
Tse ye lyudsʹke zroblene
ya zdiysnyu yoho do retribution
Yakyy retribution
Doskonalyy ta vsebichnyy
Ochevydnyy do vsikh lyudey
Nad dev'yatnadtsyato

My pryznachaly anhely buty okhorontsi Pekla, ta my pryznachyly yikhnye chyslo (19) ( 1) shchob poturbuvaty disbelievers, ( 2) shchob perekonaty Khrystyyanyna ta Yevreyiv (shcho tse ye bozhestvenne svyate pysannya), ( 3) shchob posylyty viru viddanu, ( 4) shchob usunuty vsi slidy sumnivu z serdenʹok Khrystyyanyna, Yevreyiv, tak zhe, yak i viruyuchiv, ta ( 5) expose tsya kotra havanʹ sumniv u yikhnikh serdenʹkakh, ta disbelievers; vony skazhutʹ, "Shcho BOH oznachav tsiyeyu alehoriyeyu?" BOH takym chynom posylaye astray whomever Vin wills, ta dovidnyky whomever Vin wills. Nikhto ne znaye soldativ vashoho Lorda krim Vin. Tse ye reminder dlya lyudey
Absolyutno, (ya prysyahayu) misyatsem
Ta nich yak tse propuskaye
Ta ranok yak tse blyshchytʹ
Tse ye odne z velykykh dyv
poperedzhennya do lyudstva
Dlya ts sered vas kotrykh bazhayete prosunutysya, abo rehres
Kozhna dusha trapped yoho hrikhamy
Krim dlya tsykh na pravi
V toy chas, yak u Rayu, vony poprosyatʹ
Pro vynuvatyy
Shcho prynosyly vam do tse retribution
Vony skazhutʹ, "My ne zauvazhyly kontaktni molytvy (Salat)
My ne hoduvalysʹ bidnyy
My blundered z blunderers
My disbelieved u Dni Vyroku
Do certainty prybuv do nas zaraz
zastupnytstvo poserednykiv nikoly ne dopomozhe yim
Chomu vony tak neprykhylʹni do tse reminder
Bihayuchyy lyublyatʹ zebry
Khto tikayutʹ z leva
kozhnyy odyn z nykh zakhochutʹ otrymaty svyate pysannya osobysto
Diysno, vony ne bo U maybutnʹomu
Diysno, tse ye reminder
Dlya tsykh khto bazhayutʹ vzyaty uvahu
Vony ne mozhutʹ vzyaty uvahu proty BOZHOHO budutʹ. Vin yavlyaye soboyu dzherelo righteousness; Vin yavlyaye soboyu dzherelo forgiveness
ya prysyahayu Dnem Resurrection
Ta ya prysyahayu osudzhuyuchoyu dusheyu
lyudsʹke isnuvannya dumayemo shcho my ne rekonstruyuyemo yoho kistky
Tak diysno; my vmiyemo rekonstruyuvaty yoho paletsʹ tip
Ale lyudsʹke isnuvannya maye tendentsiyu poviryty tilʹky shcho vin dyvytʹsya pered yo
Vin piddaye sumnivu Denʹ Resurrection
Odnoho razu zir tochytʹsya
Ta misyatsʹ eclipsed
Ta sontse ta krakh misyatsya u odyn odnym
lyudsʹke isnuvannya skazhe na shcho denʹ, "De yavlyaye soboyu vtechu
Absolyutno, nemaye vtechi
Do vashoho Lorda, na shcho denʹ, yavlyaye soboyu zaklyuchnu dolyu
lyudsʹkyy buduchy bude informuvatysya, na shcho denʹ, vse vin shchob prosunutysya sebe, ta vse vin do rehresu sebe
lyudsʹkyy buduchy bude yoho vlasnyy suddya
Nomer ne vybachaye bude vyznavatysya
Ne posuvayutʹ vash yazyk hasten tse
Tse - my shcho zberemo tse u Quran
Odnoho razu my deklamuyemo tse, vy budete proslidkuvaty taki Quran
Todi tse - my shcho roz'yasnymo tse
Diysno, vy lyubyte tse fleeting zhyttya
V toy chas, yak disregarding U maybutnʹomu
Deyaki oblychchya, na shcho denʹ, bude shchaslyvyy
Dyvlyatʹsya na yikhnʹoho Lorda
Inshi oblychchya budutʹ, na shcho denʹ, neshchasnyy
Ochikuyutʹ nayhirshyy
Diysno, koly (dusha) dosyahaye horla
Ta tse zamovlyayetʹsya: "Dozvolenyy idutʹ
Vin znaye tse yavlyaye soboyu kinetsʹ
Kozhna noha poklade neporushnu bilya inshoyi nohy
Do vashoho Lorda, na shcho denʹ, yavlyaye soboyu sklykayutʹ
Dlya vin zauvazhyv ni dobrodiynistʹ, ni kontaktni molytvy (Salat)
Ale vin disbelieved ta prohnanyy
Z yoho rodynoyu, vin diyav zukhvalo
Vy zasluzhyly tse
Diysno, vy zasluzhyly tse
lyudsʹke isnuvannya dumayutʹ shcho vin poyide do nichoho
vin ne kraplya ejected semen
Todi Vin stvoryuvav embryo z tse
Vin vstyh u muzhchynu abo zhinku
Vin todi nespromozhnyy YE ozhyvayutʹ mertvyy
tse ne fakt shcho tam chas koly lyudsʹkyy vkhodyv do kompetentsiyi nichoho ne buty z·hadane
My stvoryuvaly lyudsʹkyy z ridkoyi sumishi, z dvokh batʹkiv, aby vyprobuvaty yoho. Otzhe, my zrobyly yomu slukhach ta seer
My pokazaly yomu dva shlyakhy, todi vin abo appreciative, abo unappreciative
My hotovi do disbelievers skriplyaye lantsyuhom, kaydany, ta palayuche Peklo
Yak dlya dobrochesni, vony vyp'yutʹ z chashok spiced z nektarom
vesna shcho rezervuyetʹsya dlya BOZHYKH sluzhbovtsiv; tse khlyne tomu shcho vony budutʹ
Vony fulfill yikhni zastavy, ta povaha denʹ tse nadzvychayno tyazhko
Vony daruyutʹ yikhnye ulyublene prodovolʹstvo do bidnoho, syroty, ta v'yaznya
My hoduyemo vas zarady BOHA; my ne ochikuyemo vynahorody vid vas, ne spasybi
My bo z nashoho Lorda denʹ tse povno neshchastya ta nespokoyu
Otzhe, BOH zakhyshchaye yikh z zla shcho dnya, ta nahorodzhuye yikh z radistyu ta contentment
Vin nahorodzhuye yikh dlya yikhnʹoho steadfastness z Rayem, ta shovkom
Vony rozslablyayutʹsya tam na rozkishnomu vbranni. Vony strazhdayutʹ niyake teplo sontsya, ne budʹ-yakoho kholodnoho
tinʹ nakryvaye yikh tam, ta frukty prynosyatʹsya poruch
Vony sluzhatʹsya napiy u sribnykh konteynerakh ta chashkakh tse - translucent
Translucent chashky, khoch zrobyly sribla; vony pravylʹno zasluzhyly vse tse
Vony polyublyayutʹ napiy duzhe smachnykh smaku
Z vesny tam znav yak "Salsabeel
Sluzhatʹ yim budutʹ nevmyrushchi sluzhbovtsi. Koly vy bachyte yikh, vony budutʹ vyhlyadaty, yak rozihnani perly
De zavhodno vy dyvytesʹ, vy pobachyte blazhenstvo, ta dyvovyzhnyy dominion
Na nykh bude odyah zelenoho oksamytu, atlasu, ta sribla ornamenty. Yikhniy Lord zabezpechytʹ yikh z chystymy napoyim
Tse yavlyaye soboyu vynahorodu shcho ochikuye vas, dlya vashykh zusylʹ buly otsineni
My vidkryly do vas tse Quran; spetsialʹne vidkryttya z nas
Vy budete steadfastly vykonaty vashi zapovidi Lorda, ta ne pidkoryayetesya budʹ-yakomu sinful disbeliever sered nykh
Ta svyatkuyutʹ nazvu vashoho dnya Lorda ta nochi
Protyahom nochi, padayutʹ prostrate pered tym, yak Yo, ta glorify Yo bahato dovhoyi nochi
Tsi lyudy preoccupied z tse fleeting zhyttya, v toy chas, yak disregarding - tilʹky poperedu nykh - vazhkyy denʹ
My utvoryly yikh, ta vstanovyly yikh, ta, koly zavhodno my budemo, my mozhemo zaminyty inshi u yikhnʹomu mistsi
Tse ye reminder: whoever wills bude vybraty shlyakh do yoho Lorda
Shchob ni vy budete ye z·hidno z BOZHYM budete. BOH Omniscient, Mudryy
Vin prypuskaye whomever Vin wills u Yoho myloserdya. Yak dlya porushnykiv, Vin maye hotovi do nykh bolisnyy retribution
(Anhely) vidpravlyav pidryad
Shchob zahnaty viter
Vorushatʹsya khmary
Rozpodilyayutʹ umovy
Dostavlyayutʹ povidomlennya
Harna novyna, tak zhe, yak i poperedzhennya
Shcho obitsyayetʹsya prybudutʹ proyty
Otzhe, koly zirky vydobuyutʹsya
nebo vidkryvayetʹsya
hory pidryvayutʹsya
kur'yery sklykayutʹsya
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu pryznachenyy denʹ
Denʹ Rishennya
Shcho Denʹ Rishennya
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
my ne vynyshchyly bilʹsh ranni heneratsiyi
Todi my zrobyly inshym sliduyemo za nymy
Tse ye yaki my do zlochyntsiv
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
my ne utvoryly vas z nyzʹko ridki
Todi my rozmistyly tse u dobre-zakhyshchenomu skladi
Protyahom spetsyfichnoho periodu
My obmiryly tse akuratno. My yavlyayemo soboyu krashchykh dyzayneriv
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
my ne zrobyly zemlyu abode
Dlya zhyvyy ta mertvyy
My rozmistyly na tse vysoki hory, ta yakshcho vy z svizhoyu vodoyu vypyty
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Idete do shcho vy vykorystaly disbelieve
Idutʹ do tini trʹokh riznykh shchilʹnosti
Dosi, tse zabezpechuye ni coolness, ni zakhyst z tepla
Tse kydaye iskru taki velyki yak osobnyaky
Takyy zhovtyy yak kolir verblyudiv
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ vony ne rozmovlyayutʹ
Ne podani vony dozvil pereprosyty
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Tse yavlyaye soboyu Denʹ Rishennya. My sklykaly vas ta poperedni heneratsiyi
Yakshcho vy mayete budʹ-yaki skhemy, idete vpered ta skhema
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
spravedlyvyy otrymayutʹ nasolodu vid tini ta pruzhyn
Ta frukty shcho vony bazhayutʹ
Hostyatʹsya ta napiy happily v obmin na vashi pratsi
My takym chynom nahorodzhuyemo dobrochesnyy
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Hostyatʹsya ta polyublyayutʹ tymchasovo; vy ye vynuvati
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Koly vony rozpovidayutʹsya, "Klanyayutʹsya vnyz," vony ne klanyayutʹsya vnyz
Prykroshchi na shcho denʹ do rejectors
Kotryy Hadith, za vynyatkom tse, vony uphold
